sense.name: commit assets to
sense.examples: They are investing in mutual funds. He has invested most of his time to that cause. Millions are being invested in the new construction project.

sense.name: be endowed with a capability, attribute
sense.examples: The President has been invested with the power to declare war. A charm invests a face. Her child is invested with a gift for drawing.

sense.name: to clothe or adorn
sense.examples: The emporer was invested in purple silk robes and jewels.

sense.name: induct or install into a position
sense.examples: They are investing John into the Honor Society. They invested a new emperor, after the overthrow of the old one.
